amendment.description: To provide that none of the funds made available under the Act may be used to circumvent any statutory or administrative formula-driven or competitive awarding process to award funds to a project in response to a request from a Member of Congress, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3286 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3286 proposed by Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR S12894; text: CR S12894) To provide that none of the funds made available under the Act may be used to circumvent any statutory or administrative formula-driven or competitive awarding process to award funds to a project in response to a request from a Member of Congress, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3286 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3286 proposed by Senator DeMint.
